message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it offers a lot of value at this price. What do you think?
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit too high for me.  I'm really interested in this item, but I'm only willing to pay $120.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget, but $200 is the lowest I can go right now. This item is in high demand, and I'm confident it's worth the price.  What do you say?
